title: Beevor on Arnhem
itunes:title: Beevor on Arnhem
itunes:subtitle: Bestselling military historian Antony Beevor discusses his new book, which outlines why 1944’s Operation Market Garden was one of the biggest disasters of the Allied war effort
description:
Bestselling military historian Antony Beevor discusses his new book, which outlines why 1944’s Operation Market Garden was one of the biggest disasters of the Allied war effort

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
